entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 7:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
